author: Huawei
description:
A transformation is underway in Zimbabwe. Through the #DigiTruck, #Huawei and the Ministry of ICT are bringing digital learning directly to communities, giving students and citizens the skills they need to thrive in a modern, connected world.

This initiative is empowering local talent, expanding opportunities, and shaping a digital future that includes everyone. #ICTKnowledge4All #SmartEducation #Zimbabwe #DigitalLiteracy
title: DigiTruck Expands Digital Learning Access in Zimbabwe
